message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be very valuable to you.  I'm starting with an offer of $13,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $11,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is still a good price for a product that is worth $12,000 to you.
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer. While I understand your position, I would like to propose $12,000 as the final price for the product. I believe this aligns closely with its value to me.
